title: After Hiroshi (For H. Ed. Robison)
marks:
Signature and Marks
 LRC, in pencil: [Micah 1989]; LLC, in pencil: [Aft
description: silhouette of a robed figure standing on top of a mountain ledge holding staff; blue clouds and mountain peaks below; orange, white, and blue sky above
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
